message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG 

The paper focuses on generating natural language explanations conditioned on visual perception, which is a task commonly studied in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper proposes a model that is memory-aware and designed for use in autonomous agents, which suggests relevance to robotics (cs.RO) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the computational demands of the proposed approach, which could also be of interest to researchers in machine learning (cs.LG).
